name: Nested
highlight: The one-stop SocialFi app to build, manage, replicate and monetize portfolios.
summary: Nested is a social trading platform aimed at democratizing and socializing DeFi. Multi-chain and built to scale, Nested allows users to build a profile and then create, copy, manage, update, send and share financial portfolios. These financial portfolios — the 'Nested portfolios'— are represented as non-fungible tokens (NFTs), reflecting sets of tokens.
